participant_1.name: Jordan Smith
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, enjoys exploring new movies and the outdoors.
participant_1.background: I like to go to the movies. I worked 3 jobs at the same time for more than 5 years. I walk more than 2 miles a day. My favorite car is the ford mustang. I have a pit bull and a chihuahua.

participant_2.name: Emily Johnson
participant_2.personality: Dedicated and nurturing, with a passion for technology and family values.
participant_2.background: I have two kids. I love robotics. I am fairly conservative in politics. I work at amazon. I live in a rural community.
